issueList.title: Create wireframes of the web pages
issueList.body: You have to create at least one wireframe, but you can create as many wireframe you want. Consider that (probably) you will implement only one page.

issueList.title: Create index.html according to wireframe
issueList.body: A complete and working index.html that is compliant with the wireframe.

issueList.title: Create style.css according to wireframe
issueList.body: A complete and working style.css that is compliant with the wireframe.

issueList.title: Create data.json containing dynamic data of the page
issueList.body: This file has to contain a *list* of object with data required to make the page dynamic.

issueList.title: Create app.js that makes page dynamic
issueList.body: Create an app.js file that read a json file and, through a loop, generate the HTML elements of the page and append them in the proper place.

issueList.title: Create data.php that returns the same json as data.json
issueList.body: Create an data.php file that read declare an object and assign to it all the value according to data.json. Then encode the object into a JSON string and return it.

issueList.title: Update the README.md with description and snapshots of your project, in English language
issueList.body: The README.md has to contain a description of your project, written in *English*. Please add also at least a screenshot of your page that shows the implementation of the wireframe.

issueList.title: Upload docker-config.yml and site.conf with the proper port to support Docker
issueList.body: You can find these file in the teacher repository. Please remember to update the port number, as told in classroom.
